newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures finish mostly lower.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures finish mostly lower.

text.p: U.S. stock index futures finished mostly lower as the market continued to relieve overbought conditions from Monday, traders said.
Profit-taking lasted well into the afternoon, as a negative performance in the U.S. T-bond futures market did little to pick the market off its lows, they said.
March Standard & Poor's 500s re-tested the daily low of 811.30 twice in the afternoon before triggering sell-stop orders that sent the contract lower in the last 15 minutes of pit trade.
